channel.title: My New Background || what you think?
channel.description:
what you think about my new background??
[img]http://i40.tinypic.com/24o7vnr.png[/img]
i almost never work with 2d text , this is my first try on it , what you think
- snijder design :)

I think it looks bad, text, outline, and a simple brush.

item.source: My New Background || what you think?

item.title: My New Background || what you think?
item.dc:creator: @Bullos Bullos
item.description:
@Bullos wrote:

Spark_:

It could be better, the clouds on the butter are just dabbed on with a smoke/cloud brush. You should make them fit in with eachother. Looks like you took the brush tool and just clicked a couple times at the bottom. As for the text, the font is hard to read that P looks like a deformed D. The stroke you put on, the red is a brighter red than the rest of the red you used. Besides that uhm yeah good job.

its an R lawl

Read full topic
item.source: My New Background || what you think?
